description: '''Manila sound''' ([[Filipino language|Filipino]]: ''Tunog ng Maynila'') is a [[music genre]] in the Philippines that began in the mid-1970s in [[Metro Manila]]. The genre flourished and peaked in the mid to late-1970s during the [[Martial law in the Philippines#Under the Marcos administration|Philippine martial law era]] and has influenced most of the modern genres in the country by being the forerunner to [[Original Pilipino Music|OPM]].
